website_summaries.verdict: A premier name in cymbals, this is a solid set, perfect for beginning drummers who don't want to sacrifice quality.
pros: Great for both practice and playing actual gigs
Crash and hi-hat get high marks among users, as does the overall durability of the set with normal use
Great for playing in smaller venues
cons: Frequent users – and those who tend to work cymbals extra hard – may need to replace them in about a year

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on this ZBT collection for some time now just waiting for the right time to buy. From the first time I played Zildjian cymbals I fell in love with them, The construction, craft and sound makes for an excellent cymbal. To me they are the best sounding cymbals I've ever played, I am very pleased with my ZBT's my cymbal of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the upgrade I bought for my son. He had been drumming for two years on an inexpensive set. He wanted to improve his cymbal sound, and I learned that you can't really do anything to fix existing cymbals. I had learned about Zildjain from a drummer I knew in my younger days, so I bought these. I also bought an extra stand, since it looked like there was an extra cymbal than what his kit came with.
customer_reviews.author: Lady L

customer_reviews.title: These are Great for Making Excellent Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend as he recently bought a basic drum set. These cymbals created a better sound, at a reasonable price. He hasn't stopped playing them since we replaced the cymbals. I would recommend for anyone, but especially for those who buy a beginner drum set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Good for a beginner but I would recommend saving extra dollars to get the full 20 inch ride, 16 inch crash and 14 inch hi hat cymbal pak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for beginners, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the reviews, especially Michael Keane's, because he's spot on. These might be okay for a youngster just starting out, but I wouldn't recommend them for seasoned musicians or professionals. I'm not a full time musician, I play in a garage band, but we play gigs now and then. I went looking for better cymbals almost immediately. Mr. Keane is correct. If you have some idea what you want for cymbals, you can get really good deals on used ones that sound much better than these. I'll probably be posting this set on ebay sometime in the not too distant future.
customer_reviews.author: John Chick

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and quality construction set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of beginner to intermediate cymbals. Being worked with a Gretsch Catalina Club and the sound is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals exceeded my expectations. I recommend these cymbals to everyone who likes Zildjian.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome! They’ve been to 3 gigs and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jay Balbuena

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was as promised & delivered when promised. Grandson was thrilled with the cymbals . We were very happy with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: dissatisfied, after 7 months of purchase still paid.
customer_reviews.text: Good afternoon, I made a purchase on March 1, every month are charging a fee on my credit card bill, I made the purchase the view on my card. I'm from Brazil, this month I was charged $ 61 reais. I need you to sort it out as soon as possible. I look forward to returning as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Tom_drummer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price/quality balance.
customer_reviews.text: The cymbals are good quality. Wanted to upgrade my drum set with this cymbals and I'm not disappointed. The crash looks small but it has good quality sound. Totally recommended price/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Amazing beginner cymbals. I use them with my pearl Export Series Drumset
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Got it with the beginner drum set for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Got it with the beginner drum set for my daughter. She loves it. And the symbols sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Tul123

customer_reviews.title: Good Ride and Hat, Crash so-so
customer_reviews.text: The ride and Hi-Hat cymbals sound pretty good. Its a good thing the crash was a bonus because it sounds pretty dreadful. Good starter set though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are just barely okay for me. We needed something affordable and this was definitely more affordable than most. Even with my extremely low expectations of these I am still disappointed in the sound quality and expected more from Zildjian, they sound very tin-like. But they do the job allowing me to practice but I would honestly be embarrassed to play them in public and I am not afraid to let my children go crazy on them as I would be with other expensive cymbals. I am giving them three stars only because they are better than nothing. But, I would never purchase these again though, maybe I would use pie plates instead...sorry Zildjian.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the budget minded......
customer_reviews.text: These are starter cymbals. Ok for the beginner, but as you move into more of the professional realm, you need to move to the higher quality Zildjian cymbals...A, K....If you are tight on budget go for it. If you can wait a bit more, save your money and get the better level. I have high quality cymbals that have lasted 40 years. A great investment.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: These came with my Ludwig set. These are not something you want to perform with. Dont buy these unless you are only using cymbals to practice
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: great sound  good price
customer_reviews.text: I have these cymbals and have used them for a while, they sound great and do what I need them to do. For use in a rock band they work great I don't have any complaints
customer_reviews.author: Sam mc gee

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these years ago. I am definitely glad I didn't pay full price because these only lasted about a year. I was not a fan of the sound. The ride and the hihats are the only ones that sounded decent. For this price I would go with some lower end sabians like b8(which I hear arevery good) or meinl.
customer_reviews.author: eric lee hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals sound absolutely awful. I'd rather air drum silently than hear ZBTs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Entry level
customer_reviews.text: These are stamped cymbals. They will break in no time. I had to replace the hi-hat and an 18" crash. I've had no name cymbals last longer than these.
customer_reviews.author: TechHead

customer_reviews.title: Mike Portnoy sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason why I stick to the Zildjian brand despite the fact that Sabian products are cheaper is, of course, the quality of the sound it produce. it's made from high quality and pure brass material.
customer_reviews.author: Lino

customer_reviews.title: good start
customer_reviews.text: Since sold, but a good set to start. Even played a gig and sounded nice with the band.
customer_reviews.author: jon

product_meta.title: Zildjian ZBT Starter Cymbal Set
product_meta.description:
Style:Starter Cymbal SetThe Zildjian ZBT starter set tops off your drum kit with a bright shimmer. If you want a cutting cymbal sound, you're on the right page. The Zildjian ZBT cymbal pack gives you sharp and focused 13" Hi-hats with excellent "chick factor," The lively stick definition of an 18" Zbt crash Ride, and the explosive impact of a free bonus 14" Zbt crash. Zildjian ZBT series cymbals are designed to give you crisp, incisive sound at an incredibly affordable price.
zbt is the perfect cymbal set for studying and performing any style of music on the drum set, in the school concert band or marching band. 


made from a B8 alloy (92% copper, 8% tin) with pioneering hammering technology in the legendary Zildjian sound Lab, These cymbals project with excellent response, for sonic experience, unlike other entry-level cymbals. For a trusted cymbal sound along every step of your journey from beginner to Pro, choose to play ZBT by Zildjian. 

this Zildjian ZBT starter cymbal set includes:
✅ 13" Zbt hihats
✅ 14" Zbt crash
✅ 18" Zbt crash ride

step up to bronze quality with the Zildjian ZBT cymbal pack. Add to cart now!.
feature_bullets: 🎶 beginner’s choice: The perfect cymbal choice for beginners and student drummers. Quality Bronze cymbals at an amazing price
🎶 top notch quality: learn and explore all styles – pop, rock, jazz and more – with ZBT. The Zildjian ZBT cymbal pack tops off your drum kit with a bright shimmer

🎶 perfect Combination: A bright, high-pitched sound that cuts through easily in all playing situations. Get a clean and penetrating sound of 13" Zbt Hi Hats, explosive impact of 14" Zbt Crash, and the lively stick definition and cutting bell of an 18" Zbt Crash Ride
🎶 Great value: make serious music at a great value for your money. Crafted of B8 alloy, ZBT cymbals provide a bright cutting sound that’s ready to go from the practice room to the Gig
🎶 Zildjian cymbal set Warranty: Zildjian cymbals carry a 2-year warranty against manufacturing flaws (purchased new). all Zildjian cymbals are made in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
